description.name: Satin Finish Combination Wrench Spanner Set 34-50mm 6pcs CrV (Storage Roll)
description.long_desc:
We present to you our reliable set of open-end wrenches that will meet your highest expectations. Made of CrV steel, these wrenches guarantee durability and lasting performance, providing you with reliable tools for your work.


Our set includes 6 wrenches designed for handling large screws and nuts. The wrench sizes range from 34mm to 50mm.


For practical and convenient storage, the entire set of wrenches is placed in a fabric sheet. This allows you to easily organize and store the wrenches while keeping them always within reach. The sheet also features a wall-hanging option, making access easy and saving space in your workshop or garage.


Our set of open-end wrenches is an excellent choice for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. Crafted from high-quality CrV steel, these wrenches are built for heavy-duty tasks and will prove particularly useful when working on repairs for heavy machinery.


Product Features:



  • Made of high-quality CrV steel, ensuring durability and strength.

  • The set includes six sturdy wrenches.

  • Wrench sizes range from 34mm to 50mm.

  • Perfect for servicing heavy-duty vehicles, agricultural machinery, and construction equipment.

  • The entire set is neatly organized in a practical fabric sheet for easy storage.

  • The sheet can be wall-hung, providing convenient access to the wrenches and saving space in your workshop or garage.


Technical Specifications:


Material: CrV steel


Number of pieces: 6


Wrench sizes: 34, 36, 38, 41, 46, 50 mm

description.name: Universal digital battery tester
description.long_desc:
The digital meter - battery and accumulator tester BT-168D is a practical tool that allows for quick and easy checking of the state of charge of batteries and accumulators.


The measurement of battery consumption is carried out by touching the + and - terminals of the battery/accumulator with the metal tips of the tester and reading the measurement result on the clear analog display.


Versatility of Measurements


The BT-168D allows testing various types of batteries and accumulators, such as:



  • AA (R6), AAA (R3), R14, R20, 1.5V button cell batteries (CR), 9V batteries (R9)


Simple Interface


It features a clear and easy-to-understand LCD digital display that informs the user about the battery's status. This makes it easy for users to interpret the results, even without specialized knowledge.


Quick Readings


The tester allows for quick readings of battery voltage, enabling the user to assess whether the battery is charged, needs replacement, or is in a critical state.


LED Indicators


It is often equipped with additional LED indicators that can signal the battery status through colored lighting, further facilitating the assessment.


Portability


Thanks to its compact dimensions and lightweight construction, this meter is easy to carry and can be used in various locations.


Power Flexibility


The tester is typically powered by a small amount of energy from a battery, making it independent of an external power source during measurements.

description.name: Digital multimeter with buzzer
description.long_desc:
This multimeter is a versatile measuring tool that will prove useful in various applications, allowing for precise measurements and control of various electrical parameters.




  1. Direct Current Voltage Measurement (DC):



    • Measurement ranges: 0.2 - 2 - 20 - 20 - 200 - 500 V




  2. Alternating Current Voltage Measurement (AC):



    • Measurement ranges: 200 - 500 V




  3. Direct Current Measurement (DC):



    • Measurement ranges: 0.2 - 2 - 20 - 200 mA and 5 A




  4. Resistance Measurement:



    • Measurement ranges: 0.2 - 2 - 20 - 200 - 2000 Ω




  5. Transistor and Diode Testing Function:



    • This function allows testing transistors for their proper operation and checking diodes for their conduction direction.




  6. Continuity Testing Function (buzzer):



    • This function uses a buzzer to signal whether two points are connected, which is useful for checking continuity in electrical circuits.




  7. Square Wave TTL Generator Function:



    • The TTL square wave generator function allows for generating a rectangular wave in the TTL (Transistor-Transistor Logic) standard. It is a useful tool in digital electronics for testing and analyzing digital circuits.




Technical Specification




































Direct Current Voltage 0.2 - 2 - 20 - 20 - 200 - 500 V
Alternating Current Voltage 200 - 500 V
Direct Current 0.2 - 2 - 20 - 200 mA 5 A
Resistance 0.2 - 2 - 20 - 200 - 2000 Ω
Transistor Check Yes
Diode Test Yes
Continuity Test (buzzer) Yes
Square Wave TTL Generator Yes

description.name: Freestanding door stopper - low (brushed nickel finish)
description.long_desc:
Discover an elegant and practical addition to your home - a freestanding door stop made of nickel-plated stainless steel with a brushed finish. Its diameter of 104 mm and height of 45 mm make it the ideal size to protect your walls, furniture, and windows from door impacts.


No need to worry about the risk of damages - the rubber, non-slip base ensures a stable placement on the floor, leaving no marks or scratches. What's more, our door stopper requires no installation - simply place it in the right spot.


Thanks to the high-quality materials used, our door stopper is not only durable but also presents a stylish and sophisticated look, blending perfectly with any interior.


Product Features:



  • Made of stainless steel: Ensures durability and corrosion resistance, extending its lifespan.

  • Nickel brushed finish provides an elegant appearance and easy maintenance.

  • Rubber, non-slip base ensures stability on the floor and protects it from scratches.

  • No installation required.

  • Safeguards walls / furniture / windows from door impacts.

  • Stylish and elegant design: Perfectly complements any interior decor.

  • Versatile use: Suitable for various rooms, both at home and in the office.


Technical Specification:



  • Material: Stainless steel

  • Finish: Nickel brushed

  • Diameter: 104 mm

  • Height: 45 mm

  • Weight: 1.1 kg

description.name: 6-24V automotive circuit tester with 90cm cable
description.long_desc:
We present a professional voltage tester designed specifically to check the presence of voltage in a car's electrical system. This indispensable tool is ideal for automotive enthusiasts and mechanics who want to quickly and safely determine whether there is electric voltage at a given point in the circuit. The tester features a built-in LED diode that signals the presence of voltage in the circuit.


The voltage tester allows for detecting the presence of voltage in the range of 6 to 24V. Its additional 90cm cable with a "crocodile" type clamp ensures easy and secure connection to the circuit elements, minimizing the risk of errors during testing.


Product Features:



  • Detects the presence of voltage ranging from 6 to 24V.

  • Comes with an additional 90cm cable terminated with a "crocodile" type clamp for easy and secure connection.

  • Built-in LED diode enables quick identification of active circuits.

  • Useful for automotive enthusiasts and professional mechanics.

  • A precise tool for identifying electrical issues in a car.

  • Helps save time and avoid unnecessary repairs.

description.name: 8x2mm round neodymium magnets
description.long_desc:
A cylindrical neodymium magnet with a diameter of 8 mm and a thickness of 2 mm is a small but powerful magnet constructed from neodymium, iron, and boron (NdFeB). Neodymium is a rare earth element that imparts exceptionally strong magnetic properties to the magnet.


The dimensions of this magnet are:



  • Diameter: 8 mm

  • Thickness: 2 mm


Despite its small size, cylindrical neodymium magnets are known for their significant magnetic strength. They find wide applications in various fields such as electronics, modeling, jewelry, and even medicine.


Due to its cylindrical shape, this magnet can be easily placed in different locations, and its small size makes it ideal for applications where space is limited. However, because of their powerful magnetic force, caution should be exercised when handling them to avoid the accidental attraction of metallic objects and potential damage.

description.name: 10x4x1.5mm rectangular neodymium magnets
description.long_desc:
A flat neodymium magnet with dimensions of 10 mm x 4 mm x 1.5 mm is a small, thin magnet built with neodymium, iron, and boron (NdFeB). Neodymium is a strong magnet with a rare earth element, giving it excellent magnetic properties.


The magnet's dimensions are:



  • Length: 10 mm

  • Width: 4 mm

  • Thickness: 1.5 mm


These magnets are known for their strong magnetic force compared to their size. They have various applications in different fields, such as electronics, automotive, medicine, and the toy industry.


Since this magnet is flat, it has a smooth surface, facilitating its attachment in various applications. Its small dimensions make it easy to integrate into different devices and products where a strong magnetic force is required in limited space. However, it's important to note that neodymium magnets are brittle and require careful handling to avoid damage.

description.name: 20x10x3mm rectangular neodymium magnets with screw hole
description.long_desc:
A flat neodymium magnet with dimensions of 20 mm x 10 mm x 3 mm, equipped with a screw hole, is a magnet of considerable size, constructed from neodymium, iron, and boron (NdFeB). Neodymium is a rare earth element that imparts exceptionally strong magnetic properties to this magnet.


The magnet's dimensions are:



  • Length: 20 mm

  • Width: 10 mm

  • Thickness: 3 mm


This magnet is additionally equipped with a screw hole, making it convenient for mounting in various applications. Thanks to the screw hole, it can be easily attached to different surfaces, increasing its versatility in practical applications.


Neodymium flat magnets with screw holes find applications in various fields such as electronics, industry, carpentry, and advertising. They can be used to secure different elements in places where a strong magnetic force is required. However, due to their strength, caution should be exercised during their use to avoid potential damage or attraction to metallic objects.

description.name: Non-contact voltage detector 12-1000V
description.long_desc:
The Non-Contact Voltage Tester with a range of 12-1000V and equipped with an NCV probe is an advanced tool that allows you to:



  • Detect and locate live wires,

  • Identify breaks or cracks in cables,

  • Detect blown fuses,

  • Find damaged bulbs in lighting circuits,

  • Identify individual conductors.


The non-contact function ensures that the user avoids the risk of electric shock, enhancing safety and work comfort. This handy and user-friendly device enables quick voltage detection in various objects and electrical installations.


The kit includes 2 AAA batteries, ensuring immediate readiness for use right out of the packaging. Moreover, the built-in flashlight facilitates work in low-light conditions, greatly aiding voltage detection. The signal strength bar graph and sensitivity adjustment allow for precise customization of the device according to specific needs, ensuring accuracy and effective searching.


The non-contact voltage tester finds applications in various scenarios, including electrical installations, diagnosing faults, and conducting routine voltage checks on different devices and objects.


Product Features:



  • Safe and accurate voltage detection

  • Sensitivity adjustment

  • Two AAA batteries included for instant readiness

  • Signal strength bar graph

  • Built-in flashlight for low-light work conditions

  • Automatic shut-off after approximately 30 seconds of inactivity to conserve energy

  • Audible signal


Technical Specifications:



  • Voltage Range: 12-1000V

  • Included in the package: Voltage tester, 2x AAA batteries

  • Built-in flashlight

  • Signal strength bar graph

  • Sensitivity adjustment

  • NCV probe (Non-Contact Voltage)

description.name: Bungee cord with carabiners 10mm x 60cm
description.long_desc:
10mm x 60cm Elastic Cord with Carabiners


An elastic cord designed to secure various items during transport. The metal carabiners are safe and durable, attaching to objects securely, preventing accidental detachment.


Uses:



  • Securing luggage on a bicycle

  • Securing luggage on a car

  • Attaching gear to a backpack


Features and Technical Specifications:



  • The cord can be stretched to 50% of its length

  • Color: black

  • Diameter: 10 mm

  • Length: 60 cm

description.name: Diesel fuel funnel 24mm - EASY FUEL type
description.long_desc:
Our diesel fuel funnel with a diameter of 24 mm, type EASY FUEL, is a practical tool that facilitates the process of filling a vehicle's tank.


Main Product Features:


Diameter 24 mm:
The optimal diameter of the funnel allows for smooth and fast tank filling, without unnecessary delays.


Type EASY FUEL:
The special design of the EASY FUEL funnel type makes it easy to use, minimizing spilled fuel, and protecting against contamination.


Sturdy Construction:
Made of durable materials, the funnel is corrosion-resistant, ensuring long-lasting usability.


Elastic and Crack-Resistant:
The elastic material of the funnel and crack resistance make the tool durable and adaptable to various conditions of use.


Easy to Clean:
The simple construction facilitates cleaning the funnel after use, ensuring hygiene and readiness for the next tank filling.


Long Spout:
The length of the funnel allows for easy and precise directing of the fuel stream without the risk of spills.

description.name: Grabie do siana 18 zębne (bez trzonka) (5)
description.long_desc:
Grabie do siana (bez trzonka) to idealne narzędzie dla każdego rolnika, ogrodnika lub miłośnika przyrody. Te grabie są wykonane z wysokiej jakości tworzywa, które jest odporne na i warunki atmosferyczne. Dzięki temu możesz cieszyć się nimi przez długi czas, bez obawy o uszkodzenie lub korozję. Te grabie są również bardzo lekkie, co sprawia, że są łatwe w przenoszeniu i przechowywaniu. Możesz dobrać do nich dowolny trzonek, który pasuje do twojego wzrostu i preferencji. Grabie mają 18 zębów, które są odpowiednio ukształtowane i rozmieszczone, aby skutecznie zbierać siano, liście, trawę i inne odpady roślinne.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • Wykonane z tworzywa, które jest trwałe i odporna na warunki pogodowe
  • Lekkie i łatwe w obsłudze
  • Możliwość doboru dowolnego trzonka
  • 18 zębów, które skutecznie zbierają siano i inne materiały roślinne

description.name: Drill bit auger for splitting wood 32mm + 3pcs set of adapters
description.long_desc:
32mm Wood Drill Bit - Auger Bit


A reliable tool for wood drilling, this 32mm wood drill bit ensures efficient and precise drilling. Made from carbon steel, this drill bit is durable and can withstand the demands of the job. The set includes 3 drill adapters, including 2x SDS and 1x classic hex, allowing for versatile use with various types of drills. Additionally, the drill bit comes conveniently packaged in a screw-top plastic box, making storage and transportation easy.


Features and advantages of this auger bit:



  • 32mm diameter - ideal for drilling holes in wood of various sizes.

  • Made from carbon steel - durable and resistant to load.

  • 3 drill adapters included - compatible with different types of drills.

  • Practical plastic case - easy storage and transport.


Technical specifications:



  • 32mm wood drill bit made from carbon steel

  • 3 drill adapters included: 2x SDS, 1x hex

  • Convenient plastic packaging

description.name: #2x100mm phillips head impact screwdriver CrV
description.long_desc:
Phillips Screwdriver with PH2 Cross Slot, 100mm

A comfortable handle with special grooves ensures a secure grip. The marking on the handle facilitates the identification of the screwdriver tip. The special reinforced construction allows for hammering the screwdriver.

Specifications:

Type: PH2 Phillips screwdriver
Application: hammering the screwdriver
Color: black-blue
Total Length: 100mm
Material: CrV steel
